scenario.name: UAS - answer, send BYE
scenario.send:
SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=sipp 0 0 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio 6000 RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

BYE [last_Request-URI] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [last_To:] To: [last_From:] Call-ID: [last_Call-ID] CSeq: 2 BYE Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
